body_html:
Thanks for the reply.
No, I'm not using any distributed filesystem, but I'm trying to simulate distributed training on a single node. while starting training, the checkpoints are created on my local filesystem, I'm confused, Is a distributed filesystem still needed?

body:
Thanks for the reply.
No, I'm not using any distributed filesystem, but I'm trying to simulate distributed training on a single node. while starting training, the checkpoints are created on my local filesystem, I'm confused, Is a distributed filesystem still needed?
